message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?
